title: WTB SGC 4 Barger Partial B from Sterling Auction

posts.post_title: WTB SGC 4 Barger Partial B from Sterling Auction
posts.post_content:
Missed the auction and a card I have been chasing to add back to my collection for 5 yrs now.  If the person that bought it is a board member of knows who got it please get in contact with me. I will be happy to pay very good for it.  Email me @ [url]sococamo@gmail.com[/url]
